messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, not more than 15 mice have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.
